org.kepler.gui

Class DualVerticalViewPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.kepler.gui.DualVerticalViewPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ViewPane

    public class DualVerticalViewPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ViewPane
    A ViewPane consisting of 2 vertical (side by side) ViewPaneLocations.
    Author:
    Aaron Schultz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • initializeView

        public void initializeView()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ViewPane
        Initialization of the view should be done at some point after the constructor is called. The setParentFrame() method is called by the factory before calling initializeView(). This also allows for more easily adding new functions to this interface later on.
        Specified by:
        initializeView in interface ViewPane
